channel.title: Nils C. Koebis on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher
channel.description: Recent content in Nils C. Koebis on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher

item.title: The Look Over Your Shoulder: Unethical Behaviour Decreases in the Physical Presence of Observers
item.description: The presence of an observing others curbs unethical behavior, while mere presence of an (unobserving other does not. The influence of an observing other is not qualified by payoff structure or social proximity.
